For this week's assignment, I didn't learn much more in for Quarto. What I thought made my website a lot nicer was organizing my plots in 2 columns and giving them sub-captions.

## How to get sub-captions

Here is the beginning of the second code chunk from exploring the murrell01.R script.

``` yaml
#| code-fold: true
#| fig-cap: "More Plots" 
#| fig-subcap:
#|   - "Scatterplot"
#|   - "Histogram"
#|   - "Barplot"
#|   - "Boxplot"
#|   - "Persp"
#|   - "Piechart"
#| layout-ncol: 2
#| layout-nrow: 3
```

Below, you can see what it the assignment looks like on you have applied these [Execution Options](https://quarto.org/docs/computations/execution-options.html). You can click on the hyperlink to learn them.
